titleStmt.title: The utter routing of the whole army of all the Independents and Sectaries, with the totall overthrow of their hierarchy ..., or, Independency not Gods ordinance in which all the frontires of the Presbytery ... are defended ... / by John Bastvvick, captain in the Presbyterian army.
titleStmt.author: Bastwick, John, 1593-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Macock and are to be sold by Michael Spark ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
